峱字的基本解释

峱
náo
古山名，在今中国山东省淄博市境：“子之还兮，遭我乎峱之间兮。”
古书上说的一种犬。

峱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《廣韻》奴刀切，平豪，泥。］
亦作“嶩1”。亦作“巙1”。
山名。在今山东省临淄县南。

峱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峱； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页311第33
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?奴刀切，音鐃。山在齊地。【詩·齊風】遭我乎峱之閒兮。【前漢·地理志】作嶩。【師古註】作巎峱。

峱字的起名意思

暂无。

峱
Basic explanation of words
峱
náo
The name of the ancient mountain, in the border of Zibo City, Shandong Province, China: "The son is still alive, and it's just as bad as I am."
A kind of dog mentioned in ancient books.
峱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [náo]
["Guangyun" slave knife cut, Pinghao, mud. ]
Also known as "嶩1". Also known as "巙1".
Mountain name. South of Linzi County, Shandong Province today.
峱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峱; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 311 33
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? Slave knife cut, sound. The mountains are on the ground. 【Poetry·Qi Feng】I am so leisurely. [Former Han Geography] As aunt. [Annotation to the teacher] As a sichuan.
